mods.abstract: Excerpt from radio program the Red Foley Show, featuring Red Foley (host/performer), Slim Wilson (performer), Faron Young (performer), Tabby West (performer), and Billy Walker (performer), date and episode number unknown.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
